body.name: YMMIND French Press Coffee Maker 304 Stainless Steel Coffee Press,with 4 Filters System, Heat Resistant Thickness Borosilicate French Press Glass, BPA-Free Brewed Tea Pot Coffee Plunger
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 💛【Multiple Uses】This 21oz french presses can be used as a coffee press, tea maker or milk frother. 3 to 4 cup coffee maker Suitable for home office and outdoor activities, such as camping, family gatherings.

💛【Secured Safe Materials】French press coffee maker is made of thickened borosilicate glass, with top quality 304 stainless steel and BPA-free plastic, can withstand high temperatures to ensure rust prevention, corrosion prevention, and anti-deformation, making it durable and long-lasting.

💛【4-Level Filter System】The coffee plunger use double-screen filter technology，with 4 stainless steel screens(2 of them is placed separately and can be added or used as a replacement at any time when needed), filtering 99% coffee grounds out that you can enjoy the smooth and rich-flavored coffee.

💛【Easy to Clean】Our glass french press is designed for easy cleaning. The glass carafe can be easily taken apart for a thorough cleaning, and certain parts, such as the plunger and filter, are dishwasher safe.

💛【Worry-Free After-Sales】24-hour customer service support, Please contact us via Amazon order message. Since glass is a fragile product, please check whether the glass is damaged after receiving the product, we will offer replacement glass beaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best French Press Ever!!
reviews.reviewText: This French Press package is simply the best that I can imagine at ANY price (let alone the value price it goes for!). AND it comes with everything you need to fully enjoy the FP coffee experience. It's the perfect size for 2 cups of coffee, and yet is small enough NOT to take up a lot of space - even when traveling (if you're so inclined!). It comes with all of the necessary parts, including a spare metal filter pad - and it EVEN includes a perfectly functional sponge cleaning wand, which makes cleaning it a breeze! And just as importantly, it's well made with quality parts, it looks great, and the feel you get with its smooth plunging action is pure satisfaction. I am VERY pleased with this purchase, and would heartily recommend it for any French Press Coffee lovers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This French press is great and I would highly reccomend. It also comes with a sponge, a scoop, and an extra filter. The filter works really well and my coffee comes out smooth every time. I follow the directions for ratios that came with it, but added about a half scoop more (2.5 scoops for the entire french press). It fills my 16oz mug. The size of the press is perfect as it is small enough that doesn't take up too much space and can fit in your cabinets if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and good looking French Press
reviews.reviewText: Oddly, its one of the few FP that have volume markings on the side. You would think this would be standard, but no, only a few FP have them. They help immensely if you want consistently good coffee. This FP looks good as well and is easy to clean. I use it every day with no complaints. FP are the easiest and fastest way to make strong great tasting coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee and travel size
reviews.reviewText: I use my press every day and love it! It makes just enough coffee for one person, if you have a large mug like I do. I was pleasantly surprised to see a sponge bottle brush included in the package. The coffee press is small, so it is hard to reach in to remove coffee grounds, but I use a spoon to scoop them out for recycling and then proceed to wash it with the brush provided. It is also a perfect travel size, if you prefer your coffee pressed while on the road or vacation. The container frame is well made and holds the glass in place very well. The handle is comfortable to pour and well secured. Great little coffee press to have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a Press of the French Variety
reviews.reviewText: I mean, what can one say about this product. It’s low-tech so there’s not much that can go wrong with it. The nice thing is it comes with a couple of accessories (a cleaning tool, a measuring scoop)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful French Press!!!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about this French Press but wow, it is a wonderful quality product. Not only does it look elegant, it is also constructed with high quality at a cheap price. It comes with a cleaning brush and extra screens.There is a trick to using a French Press to not get any sludge or grinds in your cup. Warm the carafe with about 2 scoops of medium ground, or finely ground, coffee and wait 4 minutes. Then slowly plunge, making sure no coffee grinds are seen catching on the filter. If this happens, simply raise the plunger and again slowly plunge down and I mean slowly taking about 2 minutes to plunge all the way. This method leaves no grinds or sludge.Fantastic product and seller. Remember that this item comes in it's own manufacturers packaging.Thank you.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Coffee press
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy it is to make my coffee. This takes up very little space in my kitchen. And it makes Fantastic coffee.
